segments.text: I notice the boy is stretching so far to reach the cookie jar, and the stool is wobbling dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s holding a plate in one hand while grabbing cookies with the other, and it looks like he’s about to lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing right there, waiting for her share, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless they’re being, and the woman doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, and he’s going to fall hard if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before or if this is their first time sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, reaching out with her hand like she’s sure she’s getting one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to regret this if the woman catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is getting closer to them, and the floor is already wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
